name: masochistically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you enjoy an activity or situation that most people would find very unpleasant: The audience began throwing things at the stage, but he masochistically continued his performance. He became masochistically obsessed with a female boss who delighted in mental torture.
More examplesFewer examplesAs a masochistically inclined young man, he was drawn to a religion which emphasized the importance of recognizing your sin.Saving and economizing can become as masochistically compulsive as gym training.They have lost every match this season, and the only fans still supporting them are those that are masochistically devoted to the club.
